title: Just One Charge: Phone battery fails
description: Join Chelcee Grimes and viral sensation Jeremy Lynch as they explore all those relatable phone battery moments. From nightmare stories about phone battery running low to the benefits of creating content on the go, they put the Galaxy A Series to the test.

components.copy: Just One Charge: Phone battery fails

text: We’ve all been there when you pick up your phone only to realise that your battery is dead. You try every trick in the book to squeeze more life from your battery and save that final bit of juice. Watch Chelcee Grimes and Jeremy Lynch as they discuss their worst (…and funniest) phone battery fail stories.
